Pre-Game Insights: India has already secured a spot in the Super 8 stage of the tournament
Heavy rains and flooding around the Central Broward Park have put the status of the fixture in doubt
Canada, playing in their first T20 World Cup, showed their grit with a win over Ireland
Apart from the inclement conditions, Virat Kohli's form has been a big talking point in the buildup for India
Post-Match Reflections: Not applicable as the article is a pre-match analysis
Miscellaneous Highlights: India kicked off their T20 World Cup campaign with an easy win against Ireland on June 5 at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
On June 9, they pulled off a thrilling comeback victory against their arch-rivals Pakistan at the same venue
On June 12, India faced co-hosts USA and secured a comfortable 7-wicket win in New York
